root: ^Nevermind. Tell me what you are looking for?
^Nothing. I was just passing by and they said you are the captain of the biggest ship in here.
^Thus, I wanted to stop by and introduce myself.
^You are not a city guard in disguise?
^Well… Even if I were, I think I wouldn't have confessed it just like that, right?
^You are smart. Tell me what's your name.
^Abbas, the son of Hakeem. Sadly, my father recently passed away and now I find myself in this city, a place I have visited only few times before.
^Vale vale. Don't need to hear your life story.
^Nah. I am just lazy to talk. So you wanna drink?
^Alcohol tio! Never heard that word before?
^Jajaja. No, I ment Alcohol… Just sarcasm.
^Captain you are a cryptic man, I must confess. Maybe I should take my leave for the sake of my own peace of mind.
^Where you goin' kid? We were having a nice convo here.
^Okay, let me stick around here to share a few more words… So I see your eye is defected. Why don't you cover it with a black piece of cloth?
^Who do I look like, eh kid? A pirate? I'm an honest captain here. Maybe you and your stereotypes should take a dive to the bottom of the sea!
^Anyway kid, I better attend to my own business. Maybe see you around later?
^Well… I hesitate to stop by - as you seem to be easily disturbed.
^Don't you worry! Come back anytime you need to check my wares. I trade lots of goods bought from faraway lands.
^Also come if you wanna share some drink with us. We may have some drink which you might not find in the tavern.
